description: Scotland's front pages: Donald Trump vows to bring about a new era of "people power" as he becomes the United States' 45th president.
title: Scotland's papers: Trump's vow of 'people power'

description: Holders Hibernian take on junior outfit Bonnyrigg Rose in one of 14 Scottish Cup fourth round ties on Saturday.
title: Scottish Cup fourth round: Hibs kick-off cup defence against Bonnyrigg Rose

description: Aberdeen plan to snatch Kris Commons from under the noses of Hibernian.
title: Scottish Gossip: Kris Commons, Stevie May and Barrie McKay

description: Urgent clarification is needed on what the devolution of stamp duty will mean for properties straddling the Wales-England border, solicitors warn.
title: Land transaction tax help call over Wales border homes

description: The Church in Wales' first woman bishop, Joanna Penberthy, is due to be consecrated.
title: Church in Wales' first woman bishop to be consecrated

description: A man wins an appeal after having his shotgun licence revoked for liking "highly offensive" Facebook messages about Islam.
title: Caernarfon man's anti-Islam Facebook posts gun licence row

description: Fire crews tackle a blaze at a commercial garage in Newport.
title: 'Explosions' heard at garage fire in Pill, Newport

description: Mae angen eglurhad "brys" ar oblygiadau datganoli treth stamp i Gymru ar gartrefi sydd ar y ffin gyda Lloegr.
title: Angen 'eglurder' treth tir datganoledig newydd Cymru

description: Ble yng Nghymru mae'r cerfluniau adnabyddus?
title: Cwis: Ble mae'r cerflun?

description: Former Wales manager John Toshack thinks Swansea City will be relegated from the Premier League.
title: Swansea City: Ex-boss John Toshack thinks Swans will be relegated

description: Scientists say ants can plot a route home even when travelling backwards.
title: Ants use Sun and memories to navigate

description: Ex-US Vice President Al Gore, who has made a new climate change film, says he thinks campaigners will "win" the debate.
title: Gore 'hoping for best' from Trump over climate

description: Temperature data for 2016 shows it is likely to have edged ahead of 2015 as the world's warmest year.
title: Climate change: Data shows 2016 likely to be warmest year yet

description: Primates are facing an extinction crisis, according to researchers who have found that 60% of species are under threat.
title: Primates facing 'extinction crisis'

description: The onboard atomic clocks that drive the satellite-navigation signals on Europe's Galileo network have been failing at an alarming rate.
title: Galileo satellites experiencing multiple clock failures

description: UK engineers finish the assembly of a wind-observing satellite that meteorologists expect to have a major impact on weather forecasts.
title: Aeolus wind mission heads for test and launch

description: The payment to the UN Green Climate Fund was announced three days before Donald Trump takes office.
title: Obama administration gives $500m to UN climate change fund

description: Video footage showing snow leopards and common leopards sharing the same habitat causes alarm.
title: Concerns over first snow and common leopards found in same area

description: The incoming Trump administration accepts far more of the research on climate change than many of their political supporters, say British scientists.
title: Trump team moving away from supporters on climate science

description: A giant wave in the atmosphere of Venus may be the biggest of its kind in the Solar System.
title: Venus wave may be Solar System's biggest

description: US astronaut Gene Cernan, commander of Apollo 17, has died, his family and Nasa announce.
title: Gene Cernan, last man to walk on Moon, dies aged 82

description: The British Antarctic Survey is pulling all staff out of the space-age Halley base in March because of a big crack in nearby ice.
title: Ice crack to put UK Antarctic base in shut-down

description: Flames from an exploding battery were put out in less than half a second during tests.
title: Battery with inbuilt 'fire extinguisher' developed

description: The US SpaceX rocket company resumes operations after a launch pad explosion in September.
title: SpaceX returns to flight with Falcon 9 rocket launch

description: The trade in caged birds poses a risk to native species if birds manage to escape, research suggests.
title: Alien bird risk from pet trade

description: By studying the long lives of killer whale families, researchers say they have solved the evolutionary mystery of the menopause.
title: Orcas reveal the origin of menopause

description: Prince Charles co-authors a book for adults in the style of the well-known children's series.
title: Prince Charles co-authors Ladybird climate change book

description: Scientists say they have solved the mystery surrounding a sea creature that lived more than 500 million years ago.
title: Mysterious fossils find place on the tree of life

description: Plans for a £1.3bn tidal lagoon off Swansea are backed in a government-commissioned review.
title: Tidal lagoon: £1.3bn Swansea Bay project backed by review

description: A warming world is harming insects ability to reproduce, which could have long-term consequences, scientists warn.
title: Warming world harming insects' reproduction, says study

description: A male Japanese monkey has been filmed trying to mount and mate with a Sika deer.
title: Japanese monkey tries to mate with deer

description: Targets on CO2 will continue despite a climate change sceptic becoming president, a UK minister says.
title: Donald Trump win 'won't sway world on climate'

description: Critically endangered chimpanzees in Ivory Coast craft extra-absorbent drinking sticks, researchers observe.
title: Primate tool-use: Chimpanzees make drinking sticks

description: Scientists believe they have established the identity of a "missing element" in the Earth's core.
title: New candidate for 'missing element' in Earth's core

description: Scientists say mothers hold babies on the left to help in bonding - and this is not unique to humans.
title: Mother-baby bonding insight revealed
